page.title: 02ELPHINSTONE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: ON WEDNESDAYS AND THURSDAYS THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB AT 7 O'CLOCK. MRS BERRY AND MR.BERRY RUN THE YOUTH CLUB AND A LADY FROM THE VILLAGE HELPS SOME OF THE LITTLE ONES TO MAKE POMPOMS AND DRAW PICTURES. ANOTHER PERSON HELPS SOME OF THE PRIMARY 7 GIRLS TO MAKE RAG DOLLS AND THEY USE THE BIG CLASSROOM TO DO THEIR WORK IN. WE HAVE A DARTBOARD, A SNOOKER TABLE AND A RECORD PLAYER. MOST OF THE BIG ONES PLAY THE RECORDS AND SELL SWEETS AND CRISPS. WE GO WALKS AND PLAY FOOTBALL AND SOMETIMES WE HAVE AN ARCHERY BOARD DOWN IN THE BOTTOM OF OUR PLAYGROUND. IT STARTS AT 7PM AND FINISHES AT 9PM.
